    • Constructor Detail

      • StateMachine

        public StateMachine(StateFlowGraph sfg,
            StateVertex indexState)
        Create a new StateMachine with a empty Invariant list in the InvariantChecker.
        Parameters:
        sfg - the state flow graph that is shared.
        indexState - the state representing the Index vertix

      • StateMachine

        public StateMachine(StateFlowGraph sfg,
            StateVertex indexState,
            List<Invariant> invariantList)
        Create a new StateMachine.
        Parameters:
        sfg - the state flow graph that is shared.
        indexState - the state representing the Index vertix
        invariantList - the invariants to use in the InvariantChecker.

    • Method Detail

      • changeState

        public boolean changeState(StateVertex nextState)
        Change the currentState to the nextState if possible. The next state should already be present in the graph.
        Parameters:
        nextState - the next state.
        Returns:
        true if currentState is successfully changed.

      • getCurrentState

        public StateVertex getCurrentState()
        Return the current State in this state machine.
        Returns:
        the current State.

      • rewind

        public void rewind()
        reset the state machine to the initial state.

      • update

        public boolean update(Eventable event,
             StateVertex newState,
             EmbeddedBrowser browser,
             CrawlSession session)
        Parameters:
        event - the event edge.
        newState - the new state.
        browser - used to feet to checkInvariants
        session - the current Session
        Returns:
        true if the new state is not found in the state machine.
